001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.factory.ComponentFactory;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.base.TableComponentType;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.base.TableField;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters.FilterStrategy;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.registry.TableServiceRegistry;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.sort.SortingStrategy;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
011import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.validator.UiTableValidator;
012import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion;
013import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult;
014import java.util.List;
015
016/**
017 * Implementation of the {@link TableService} interface, providing concrete logic
018 * for interacting with table components.
019 *
020 * <p>This service is responsible for reading tables and rows, inserting values,
021 * filtering, sorting, and validating tables. It utilizes a registry to manage
022 * table-related services dynamically.
023 *
024 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
025 */
026public class TableServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<TableComponentType, Table> implements TableService {
027
028   private final TableServiceRegistry tableServiceRegistry;
029   private final UiTableValidator uiTableValidator;
030
031   /**
032    * Constructs a {@code TableServiceImpl} with the specified dependencies.
033    *
034    * @param driver               The {@link SmartWebDriver} instance for browser interactions.
035    * @param tableServiceRegistry The registry managing table services.
036    * @param uiTableValidator     The validator for performing table-related assertions.
037    */
038   public TableServiceImpl(final SmartWebDriver driver, final TableServiceRegistry tableServiceRegistry,
039                           UiTableValidator uiTableValidator) {
040      super(driver);
041      this.tableServiceRegistry = tableServiceRegistry;
042      this.uiTableValidator = uiTableValidator;
043   }
044
045   /**
046    * Creates a table component based on the specified component type.
047    *
048    * @param componentType The type of table component to create.
049    * @return The created table component instance.
050    */
051   @Override
052   protected Table createComponent(final TableComponentType componentType) {
053      Table tableComponent = ComponentFactory.getTableComponent(componentType, driver);
054      TableImpl table = (TableImpl) tableComponent;
055      table.setServiceRegistry(tableServiceRegistry);
056      return tableComponent;
057   }
058
059   /**
060    * Reads the entire table and maps its contents to the specified class type.
061    *
062    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
063    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table rows.
064    * @param <T>                The row type.
065    * @return A list of objects representing the table rows.
066    */
067   @Override
068   public final <T> List<T> readTable(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final Class<T> clazz) {
069      return getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).readTable(clazz);
070   }
071
072   /**
073    * Reads the table with only the specified fields.
074    *
075    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
076    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table rows.
077    * @param fields             The fields to extract from the table.
078    * @param <T>                The row type.
079    * @return A list of objects representing the table rows with the selected fields.
080    */
081   @Override
082   @SafeVarargs
083   public final <T> List<T> readTable(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final Class<T> clazz,
084                                      final TableField<T>... fields) {
085      return getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).readTable(clazz, fields);
086   }
087
088   /**
089    * Reads a range of rows from the table.
090    *
091    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
092    * @param start              The starting row index (inclusive, 1-based index).
093    * @param end                The ending row index (exclusive, 1-based index).
094    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table rows.
095    * @param <T>                The row type.
096    * @return A list of objects representing the selected rows.
097    */
098   @Override
099   public final <T> List<T> readTable(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final int start, final int end,
100                                      final Class<T> clazz) {
101      return getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).readTable(start, end, clazz);
102   }
103
104   /**
105    * Reads a specific range of rows from the table with only the specified fields.
106    *
107    * @param tableComponentType The type of table component being used.
108    * @param start              The starting row index (inclusive, 1-based index).
109    * @param end                The ending row index (exclusive, 1-based index).
110    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table rows.
111    * @param fields             The fields to be extracted from the table. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
112    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
113    * @return A list of objects representing the selected rows with the specified fields.
114    */
115   @Override
116   @SafeVarargs
117   public final <T> List<T> readTable(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final int start, final int end,
118                                      final Class<T> clazz, final TableField<T>... fields) {
119      return getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).readTable(start, end, clazz, fields);
120   }
121
122   /**
123    * Reads a single row from the table based on the given row index.
124    *
125    * <p>The method retrieves the data of the specified row and maps it to the provided class type.
126    *
127    * @param tableComponentType The type of table component being used.
128    * @param row                The index of the row to be read (1-based index).
129    * @param clazz              The class type representing the row structure.
130    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
131    * @return An object representing the row data.
132    */
133   @Override
134   public final <T> T readRow(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final int row, final Class<T> clazz) {
135      return getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).readRow(row, clazz);
136   }
137
138   /**
139    * Reads a single row from the table based on specific search criteria.
140    *
141    * <p>This method searches for a row matching the given criteria and maps it to the provided class type.
142    *
143    * @param tableComponentType The type of table component being used.
144    * @param searchCriteria     A list of string values used to locate the row.
145    * @param clazz              The class type representing the row structure.
146    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
147    * @return An object representing the matched row.
148    */
149   @Override
150   public final <T> T readRow(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final List<String> searchCriteria,
151                              final Class<T> clazz) {
152      return getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).readRow(searchCriteria, clazz);
153   }
154
155   /**
156    * Reads a specific row from the table based on the row index.
157    *
158    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
159    * @param row                The row index (1-based index).
160    * @param clazz              The class type representing the row.
161    * @param <T>                The row type.
162    * @return The object representing the selected row.
163    */
164   @Override
165   @SafeVarargs
166   public final <T> T readRow(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final int row, final Class<T> clazz,
167                              final TableField<T>... fields) {
168      return getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).readRow(row, clazz, fields);
169   }
170
171   /**
172    * Reads a single row from the table based on specific search criteria, retrieving only the specified fields.
173    *
174    * @param tableComponentType The type of table component being used.
175    * @param searchCriteria     A list of string values used to locate the row.
176    * @param clazz              The class type representing the row structure.
177    * @param fields             The specific fields to retrieve from the row. If not provided, all fields will be
178    *                           retrieved.
179    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
180    * @return An object representing the matched row with the specified fields.
181    */
182   @Override
183   @SafeVarargs
184   public final <T> T readRow(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final List<String> searchCriteria,
185                              final Class<T> clazz, final TableField<T>... fields) {
186      return getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).readRow(searchCriteria, clazz, fields);
187   }
188
189   /**
190    * Inserts a value into a specific cell in a table row identified by its row index.
191    *
192    * @param tableComponentType The type of table component being used.
193    * @param row                The index of the row where the value should be inserted (1-based index).
194    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table row.
195    * @param data               The data to be inserted into the row.
196    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
197    */
198   @Override
199   public final <T> void insertCellValue(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final int row,
200                                         final Class<T> clazz, final T data) {
201      getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).insertCellValue(row, clazz, data);
202   }
203
204   /**
205    * Inserts a value into a specific cell in the table.
206    *
207    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
208    * @param row                The row index (1-based index).
209    * @param clazz              The class type representing the row.
210    * @param field              The field to update.
211    * @param index              The cell index within the row (1-based index).
212    * @param value              The value to insert.
213    * @param <T>                The row type.
214    */
215   @Override
216   public final <T> void insertCellValue(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final int row,
217                                         final Class<T> clazz, final TableField<T> field, final int index,
218                                         final String... value) {
219      getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).insertCellValue(row, clazz, field, index, value);
220   }
221
222   /**
223    * Inserts a value into a specific cell of a table row identified by search criteria.
224    *
225    * @param tableComponentType The type of table component being used.
226    * @param searchCriteria     A list of string values used to locate the row.
227    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table row.
228    * @param field              The field where the value should be inserted.
229    * @param index              The index within the field where the value should be inserted (1-based index).
230    * @param values             The values to be inserted into the specified cell.
231    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
232    */
233   @Override
234   public final <T> void insertCellValue(final TableComponentType tableComponentType,
235                                         final List<String> searchCriteria, final Class<T> clazz,
236                                         final TableField<T> field, final int index, final String... values) {
237      getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).insertCellValue(searchCriteria, clazz, field, index, values);
238   }
239
240   /**
241    * Inserts an entire data object into a table row identified by search criteria.
242    *
243    * @param tableComponentType The type of table component being used.
244    * @param searchCriteria     A list of string values used to locate the row.
245    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table row.
246    * @param data               The data object containing values to be inserted into the row.
247    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
248    */
249   @Override
250   public final <T> void insertCellValue(final TableComponentType tableComponentType,
251                                         final List<String> searchCriteria, final Class<T> clazz, final T data) {
252      getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).insertCellValue(searchCriteria, clazz, data);
253   }
254
255   /**
256    * Applies a filter to a table column based on a specified filtering strategy.
257    *
258    * @param tableComponentType The type of table component being used.
259    * @param tclass             The class type representing the table structure.
260    * @param column             The column field on which the filter should be applied.
261    * @param filterStrategy     The filtering strategy to be used.
262    * @param values             The values used for filtering the table.
263    * @param <T>                The type of the table row representation.
264    */
265   @Override
266   public final <T> void filterTable(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final Class<T> tclass,
267                                     final TableField<T> column, final FilterStrategy filterStrategy,
268                                     final String... values) {
269      getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).filterTable(tclass, column, filterStrategy, values);
270   }
271
272   /**
273    * Sorts the table based on the specified column and sorting strategy.
274    *
275    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
276    * @param tclass             The class type representing the table rows.
277    * @param column             The column to be sorted.
278    * @param sortingStrategy    The sorting strategy to be applied.
279    * @param <T>                The row type.
280    */
281   @Override
282   public final <T> void sortTable(final TableComponentType tableComponentType, final Class<T> tclass,
283                                   final TableField<T> column, final SortingStrategy sortingStrategy) {
284      getOrCreateComponent(tableComponentType).sortTable(tclass, column, sortingStrategy);
285   }
286
287   /**
288    * Validates a table against the specified assertions.
289    *
290    * @param table      The table object to validate.
291    * @param assertions The assertions to apply for validation.
292    * @param <T>        The row type.
293    * @return A list of assertion results indicating the validation outcome.
294    */
295   @Override
296   public <T> List<AssertionResult<T>> validate(final Object table, final Assertion... assertions) {
297      if (table == null) {
298         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Table cannot be null for validation.");
299      }
300      if (assertions == null || assertions.length == 0) {
301         throw new IllegalArgumentException("At least one assertion must be provided.");
302      }
303      return uiTableValidator.validateTable(table, assertions);
304   }
305
306}
